statements: UPDATE KPIs SET visualization_type = 'bar' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE KPIs SET calculation_query = 'SELECT SUM(revenue) FROM sales_data WHERE year = 2021;' WHERE kpi_name = 'Total Revenue';

UPDATE KPIs SET calculation_query='SELECT SUM(revenue) FROM sales WHERE YEAR(date) = 2022', kpi_name='Total Revenue' WHERE id=2;

UPDATE Calculations SET calculation_formula = 'SUM(kpi_value)' WHERE calc_name = 'Total KPI';
